metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Biology: Ecology, Evolution, & Biodiversity Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Understand nature like a biologist.. Embark on a journey from the classroom to museums and nature reserves to gain a broad overview and appreciation of three important fields of biology.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Inspecting specimens, Interpreting phylogenetic trees, Examining ideas, Recording observations, Identifying species,
